QuestData.Title: Tides of Darkness
QuestData.Description: The battle's proceeding just the way I wanted it. With their warriors nearly exhausted, I've sent in our cavalry.$B$BWhat I wasn't expecting was ogres. Our knights are well matched against the brutes, but they're going to need help.$B$BI need you back on the field right away, $n. Few can bring down an ogre on foot, but I think I can count on you. Don't disappoint me.
QuestData.RewardText: Going toe to toe with ogres is impressive, $n. I'm glad I've got soldiers like you out here.
